name: GovernorSpoke
description: Cross-chain Oracle L2 Governor Spoke. Governor contract deployed on L2 that receives governance actions from Ethereum.

functionDecorators.name: getChildMessenger
functionDecorators.description: Returns the child messenger address set in the finder.

returnDecorators.description: ChildMessengerInterface instance of child messenger deployed on L2.

functionDecorators.name: processMessageFromParent
functionDecorators.description: Executes governance transaction created on Ethereum. Can only be called by ChildMessenger contract that wants to execute governance action on this child chain that originated from DVM voters on root chain. ChildMessenger should only receive communication from ParentMessenger on mainnet. See the SpokeBase for the onlyMessenger modifier.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Contains the target address and the encoded function selector + ABI encoded params to include in delegated transaction.
